m_szDocTitle: Looks like a 23-cent gas tax hike is the TTF solution : newjersey
m_szDocSumamry: Looks like a 23-cent gas tax hike is the TTF solution : newjersey  456Looks like a 23-cent gas tax hike is the TTF solution (app.com)submitted 19 days ago by roadsage16 commentsshareloading...  [–]leetnewb 2 points3 points4 points 19 days ago (3 children)In fiscal 1989, NJ collected $417 million in gas taxes. In F2015, NJ collected $536 million in gas taxes. So the state does have more to work with; on the other hand, it hasn't kept up with inflation. To be honest, that surprised me. I would have expected with the population growth over that time, the changes in gas tax should have been higher
